iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { FF 75 08 E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Push + Call (TRACE //3)
        $pattern1 = { E8 ?? ?? ?? ?? 85 C0 0F 84 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Call + Test + JE (TRACE //1)
        $pattern2 = { FF 75 08 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Push + Call (TRACE //4)

    condition:
        any of them
}
